summary: The Pay Our Military Act of 2025 aims to ensure that members of the Armed Forces, including reserve components, and supporting civilian personnel and contractors, continue to receive pay and allowances during a government shutdown. It appropriates necessary funds for this purpose, with the appropriations ceasing upon the enactment of relevant appropriations legislation or January 1, 2026. The bill is sponsored by Mr. Sullivan and was introduced in the Senate on March 6, 2025.
